name: Hell Razor
description:
It's the night of Halloween, many monsters are roaming and all you have is a gun that shoots discs to protect yourself. But the discs seem to be more of a trick than a treat...

CONTROLS:

WASD - Movement

Move Mouse - Aim

Left Mouse Button - Fire

Kill a number of enemy types, each with their own ability:

Vampires are the regular enemy type

Werewolves are slower and will cause your discs to grow in size

Frankenstein's Monster causes discs to stop

Witches will fire your disc back at you upon death, and these disc will bounce off other discs, causing discs it collides with to travel in the opposite direction too

Skeletons will split your discs in two

Part of the Disc Room Game Jam https://itch.io/jam/disc-room-game-jam

SFX by doseone

Music - Pumpkin Halloween by Bhanupong Asatamongkolchai
